property.value: Lower the cost to play Weapon and Armor attachments on Beregond by 2.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Warrior. Noble.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Boromir has at least 1 resource in his resource pool, Gondor allies get +1 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Errand-rider to move 1 resource from the resource pool of a hero you control to another hero's resource pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Lower the cost to play Citadel Custodian by 1 for each Gondor ally in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Until the end of the phase, each Gondor card in play gains the Rohan trait, and each Rohan card in play gains the Gondor trait.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Choose a Gondor hero. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Warrior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Ready a defending Gondor character. That character gets +1 Ú until the end of the phase.

property.value:
Limit 1 per character.
Response: After attached character is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Discard Damrod from play to lower your threat by 1 for each enemy in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: All characters get +2 Ú and do not exhaust to defend until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After a location leaves play as an explored location, return it to the top of the encounter deck.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Attach to a Gondor or Dunedain hero.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Spend 1 resource from attached hero's resource pool to give attached hero +1 Ú for each resource in its resource pool until the end of the phase. (Limit once per phase.)

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Outlands.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After you play Hunter of Lamedon from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Outlands card, add it to your hand. Otherwise, discard it.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Ithilien Tracker to lower the $ of the next enemy added to the staging area to 0 until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust Master of Lore to name a card type. Lower the cost for you to play the next Î card of that type by 1 until the end of the phase (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play Ranger Spikes into the staging area unattached.
If unattached, attach Ranger Spikes to the next eligible enemy that enters the staging area.
Players do not make engagement checks against attached enemy. Attached enemy gets -2 $.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Envoy of Pelargir enters play, add 1 resource to a Gondor or Noble hero's resource pool.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value:
If unattached, return Alcaron's Scroll to the staging area and it gains: "Action: Exhaust a hero to attach Alcaron's Scroll to that hero."
Forced: When the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached is damaged by an enemy attack, attach Alcaron's Scroll to that enemy.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When the player whose hero has Alcaron's Scroll attached raises his threat, Harbor Thug engages that player.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Any damage dealt by this attack is dealt to the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value: If Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero, The Leaping Fish gains: "Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase discard X cards from the top of the encounter deck where X is the number of players in the game. Add each enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.value: While Pelargir Docks is the active location, enemies get +1 Û and +1 Ú.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: Each time a location is discarded from the top of the encounter deck, raise each player's threat by 1.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal attacking enemy an additional shadow card for each Thug enemy in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard 2 cards from the top of the encounter deck. Discard an additional 2 cards for each copy of Collateral Damage in the discard pile. Then, raise each player's threat by 2 for each location discarded by this effect.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Any damage dealt by this attack is dealt to the hero with Alcaron's Scroll attached, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Ithilien

property.name: Traits
property.value: Gondor. Ranger.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Celador is in the staging area, he is committed to the current quest.
Forced: After players quest unsuccessfully or a character leaves play, deal 1 damage to Celador.
If Celador leaves play, remove him from the game.

property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value:
The players cannot advance to the next stage unless Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero.
When Revealed: Attach Alcaron's Scroll to the highest engagement cost enemy in play, if able. Otherwise, add Alcaron's Scroll to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player searches the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 enemy and adds it to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Peril in Pelargir

property.name: Text
property.value:
Enemies cannot be optionally engaged.
Forced: The first enemy revealed from the encounter deck each round makes an immediate attack against the player who controls Alcaron's Scroll from the staging area.
The players cannot defeat this stage unless Alcaron's Scroll is attached to a hero. If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Ithilien

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Add Celador to the staging area. Search the encounter deck for a copy of Ithilien Road and make it the active location. Each player must search the encounter deck for a copy of Southron Company and add it to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Into Ithilien

property.name: Text
property.value: If the players complete this stage with Celador in the staging area, advance to stage 3A (bypassing stage 2).

property.value:
If any player's threat is 37 or higher, Approaching Cair Andros gains siege.
Forced: At the end of each round, raise each player's threat by 2.
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.
